version_description:
- Fixed a bug that allowed wrong formatted phone numbers to be added on the custom block list.
- Blacklist numbers database updated
- Fixed a bug that users can enter invalid characters & wrong formatted numbers on custom blocklist.
- Scam call list updated (30/7)
- Range number blocking added.

New version 2.0 includes huge improvements both on user experience & usability!

- Range number blocking got more flexible. Now you can select exactly how many digits you want to block on your number range! Select up to 4 digits and bulk block p

- Fixed a bug on large amounts of range number blocking
- Default blocking list updated (26/10)
- Default call blocking database updated (18 Mar 2018)
- Default call blocking database updated (11 May 2018)
- Default call blocking database updated (30 Jun 2018)

- User experience now improved and range blocking feature got easier than ever to use!
Just enter the country code prefix and the phone number that you want to range block and select your range option!
- Callblocking default database updated (15/Ju

- FIxed a bug that the blocked list did not show previous numbers that users have added
- Fixed a bug on the pre-defined database updates
- Pre-defined blocking list updated (22/09/2018)
- Pre-defined blocking list updated (17/11/2018)
- Pre-defined blocking list updated (30/12/2018)
- Blocking list updated (28/07/2019)

- Added iOS 13 support
- Default callblocking list updated (29 Sep 2019)
- Fixed a bug when removing a custom blocked number, visually it wasn't removed
- Set Light mode support

- You can now block shorter phone numbers
- Callblocking list updated (05/12/19)

Enjoy a spam-free calling experience!

- Callblocking list updated (30/12/19)

Enjoy a spam-free calling experience!

- Callblocking list updated (25/01/2020)

Enjoy a spam-free calling experience!

- Callblocking list updated (12/04/2020)

Enjoy a spam-free calling experience!
- Blocking list updated (25/04/2020)

You asked for it! Now Callblocker supports up to 7-digit numbers combinations (up to 10,000,000 numbers) and up to 50,000,000 numbers in total!!
This update includes tons of performance enhancements on the CallBlocker engine that makes it run faster an

You asked for it! 

Now Callblocker supports range blocking with up to 7-digit numbers combinations (up to 10,000,000 numbers) and up to 50,000,000 numbers in total!!
This update includes tons of performance enhancements on the CallBlocker e

You asked for it! 

Now Call Ranger supports range blocking with up to 7-digit numbers combinations (up to 10,000,000 numbers) and up to 50,000,000 numbers in total!!
This update includes tons of performance enhancements on the Call Ranger e

This update includes an update to the spam phones database (23/05/2020).

If you like Call Ranger take the time a leave a honest review about it on the AppStore. It really helps us to improve it and make it better!

- iCloud support for automatically backing up your saved blocking rules.
- Blocking list updated (31/05/2020).
- Bugfixes.

- Blocking list updated (16/07/2020)
- Help info about enabling extensions added

The new version of Call Ranger brings a major engine update with tons of performance improvements & bugfixes!

• Add UNLIMITED range number rules on your list.
• 8-digits range blocking (100,000,000 number combinations).
• Only 1 extension
